page.title: 02CAERWYS QUESTIONNAIRE
page.content: During a Thursday afternoon we went round the housing estates of Caerwys with a questionnaire filled in by one adult per house. We had a response at about{50%}of houses visited. We questioned {24}men and {64}women. {25}had lived here {5}years or less. {32}had lived here most of their lives. {7} were working men,{12}working women, {3}unemployed,{30}housewives and {36} pensioners. {11% }lived here because of their work. {86%}lived here because they liked the area. The remainder moved here to be near their families or they had always lived here. {67%}were very happy with Caerwys as it is now. {33% }felt that changes are needed. continued..........
